item.title: Enabling IPv6 with DHCPv6-PD and PPPoE on a Fortigate
item.description: Out of morbid curiosity (and lack of IPv4 public address space available to me), I decided I wanted to enable IPv6 in my lab. However, before taking the plunge there, I would try it out on my residential ADSL line, I use the same brand of firewall there as in my lab so the experience should be largely transferable. So for a bit of context; I have a Zen Internet ADSL line (I saw the fiber van around the cabinet recently so maybe that will change) - auth to the provider is done via PPPoE on IPv4.
